description:
~There’s a reason they have stayed away, but the reason you’ve come is stronger still~

Ethernal is a multiplayer dungeon generated and owned by the players. Built on the blockchain, Ethernal Alpha 2.0 ran on Matic TestnetV3 from June 11, 2020 to July 21, 2020.

As a token of gratitude to our elite heroes—who have bravely explored the dungeon, generated rooms, and defeated monsters—we are gifting this NFT to those players.

✩ Level 8+ Heroes (30):
hauSJanda, Miojo, STAN, Menathor, JiullRock, Butchy, Avalarion, subimpact, Spliff, Montaurus, Mizu, Icybird, Enumalis, Randolin, Cyrus, hackingmoneyph, GameWatch21, Dark, kenji, Htirav, subterranean, target_sir, Yunoh, Netw0rx, Master, Buck, mero, Clackity, Skeenee, AxieCab, ppk.
name: History of Ethernal Alpha Mumbai
